snippet: The Carlyle Group plans to seek a valuation of up to $8 billion in its initial public offering, a person briefed on the matter said Tuesday, as the firm marches toward a stock market listing.
abstract: The Carlyle Group plans to seek a valuation of up to $8 billion in its initial public offering, a person briefed on the matter said Tuesday, as the firm marches toward a stock market listing.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Carlyle Seeks Valuation of Up to $8 Billion in I.P.O.
